meanings.definition: Homebrews: Noun - Alcoholic beverages brewed at home.
meanings.sent1: My dad makes delicious homebrews in our kitchen.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy trying different types of homebrews made by hobbyists.
meanings.sent3: The party was a hit thanks to the tasty homebrews everyone brought.
meanings.sent4: Her homebrews were like a symphony of flavors dancing on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the homebrews filled the room, inviting everyone to take a sip.

meanings.definition: Homebrews: Verb - To brew alcoholic beverages at home.
meanings.sent1: We often homebrews on weekends for fun.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to homebrews from her uncle who is an expert.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe he tried to homebrews in his tiny apartment!
meanings.sent4: The couple decided to homebrews their own special beer for their wedding.
meanings.sent5: The group of friends gathered to homebrews a batch of cider together.
